Utility functions

Contextual utility functions.

`dec<-`()

Decrement

`inc<-`()

Increment

inv()

Inverse from Choleski (or QR) Decomposition.

sum_of()

Sum of list

max_in()

Get maximum value

is_rstudio()

Check if in RStudio

set_external()

Change Default Graphing Device from RStudio
